name: Haunted House: Dice til Dawn
description:
Wandering in the woods, you come across a haunted house. Do you dare to enter?

This creepy house is littered with magic dice that unlock doors and slay hungry mice. It will take strategy and determination to clear all 3 floors of this haunted house.

Commands:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Space x2 - Double Jump

R - Rotate Camera

P or ESC - Pause, Volume, Restart Level

M - Mute
